name: Holland Bendlow
overview:
Holland Bendelow are the UK’s leading flotation consultancy, with a successful track record of advising UK and International companies about stock market flotation.

We specialises in advising the Directors and/or owners of privately owned pre-float companies considering floating their companies on any of the UK stock markets, including, AIM, PLUS ( ICAP –ISDX), The London Stock Exchanges Main Market, and ShareMark (Assetmatch).

Holland Bendelow advise a broad range of sizes and sectors of company, from small growing companies, including university spin outs, to major international companies seeking significant fundraisings.
